channel.title: Client crashes when trying to talk to an NPC
channel.description:
Meant to say server crashes, but the error comes up in the client box.
This is a PI 317 Sever.
I get an error when talking to an npc on my server (Wise Old Man) Who is supposed to open up a shop when talked to. This used to work but no longer does. On the client cmd window thing I get this error:
NPC.DAT : 1489108188 Called method225 NPC.IDX : 1489126980 Called method225 1 Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutO at ItemDef.forID(ItemDef.java:222) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:316) at client.drawInterface(client.java:8357) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:8968) at client.method146(client.java:12032) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8189) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8903) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4689) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Please help :/

item.title: Client crashes when trying to talk to an NPC
item.dc:creator: @Crazyjackson78 Crazyjackson78
item.description:
@Crazyjackson78 wrote:

Meant to say server crashes, but the error comes up in the client box.

This is a PI 317 Sever.

I get an error when talking to an npc on my server (Wise Old Man) Who is supposed to open up a shop when talked to. This used to work but no longer does. On the client cmd window thing I get this error:

NPC.DAT : 1489108188
Called method225
NPC.IDX : 1489126980
Called method225
1
Exception in thread “Thread-5” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutO
at ItemDef.forID(ItemDef.java:222)
at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:316)
at client.drawInterface(client.java:8357)
at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:8968)
at client.method146(client.java:12032)
at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8189)
at client.processDrawing(client.java:8903)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108)
at client.run(client.java:4689)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Please help

Read full topic
